attributes.action: Lower the age for voting to 16 year olds on all elections in UK
attributes.additional_details: It worked in Scotland for the referendum and it's time to allow this with young people engaging on political events such as climate change. Lets not isolate however cooperate with all ages.
attributes.background: If you are old enough to work you should have the right to vote in UK. Engaging young people into politics is crucial and letting them have a say on the future.
